items.summary: Backend: Add a new enum type `PropertyStatus` with exactly these variants: `#available`, `#visitCompleted`, `#underConfirmation`, `#bookedViaSTYO`.
Backend: Extend the `Listing` record to include a new field `propertyStatus : PropertyStatus` while keeping the existing `availability` field unchanged.

Backend: Ensure default value for `propertyStatus` is `#available` for (a) all newly created listings and (b) all existing listings returned by queries (including any demo listings, if present), without changing existing `availability` values.
Frontend: Update generated/consumed backend types so the frontend `Listing` type includes `propertyStatus` and the frontend can render it without TypeScript errors.

Frontend: Add a dynamic `propertyStatus` badge to the property card component (`frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx`) that reflects the listing’s `propertyStatus` value with clear English labels: "Available", "Visit Completed", "Under Confirmation", "Booked via STYO".

Frontend: Add a dynamic `propertyStatus` badge to the property detail page (current route `/unlock/$listingId`, `frontend/src/pages/UnlockPage.tsx`) that reflects the listing’s `propertyStatus` value using the same 4 English labels.
Scope guard: Do not implement any IST dual-confirmation or automatic status-update logic yet; only add the 4-status model and UI display.
